theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.NAME: [#b7410e]Lacerate
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. NL Evolve: Attack an enemy with 3+ Lacerate.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Take !M! damage and deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. Deal 10% bonus damage per Lacerate stack. NL Evolve: Attack an enemy with 3+ Lacerate.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.NAME: [#b7410e]Shield [#b7410e]Eater
theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Absorb up to !M! Block from target enemy. NL Evolve: Destroy all enemy Block.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirDefensiveStance.NAME: [#b7410e]Defensive [#b7410e]Stance
theWeaponMaster:FenrirDefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Gain !B! Block and Defensive Stance. Lose 20% of this Block whenever you play a Fenrir card. NL Evolve: All enemies intend to attack you.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.NAME: [#b7410e]Heavy [#b7410e]Swing
theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage for every card in your hand, apply Lacerate equal to half the cards in your hand.NL Evolve: Play while holding more than 3 cards. Gains half the Evolution bonuses.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.NAME: [#b7410e]Fenrir [#b7410e]Unleashed
theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage to the weakest enemy. Overkill damage is added to the next attack. NL Unstoppable, Evolve: Kill an enemy.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flash !M!: Draw a card.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Power_Flash !M!: Draw a card.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusEssenceSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Essence [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusEssenceSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flash !M!: Enemies take !SV! damage for every unique buff and debuff they have.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusEssenceSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Power_Flash !M!: Enemies take !SV! damage for every unique buff and debuff they have.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusModularSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Modular [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusModularSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Utility_Flash 4: Gain special effects for each card you discard.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Iai [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL Flash !M!: Increase Flash damage by 25% for every turn retained. Resets when discarded or used. NL Turns retained: !SV!.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL Power_Flash !M!: Increase discard damage by 33% for every turn retained. Resets when discarded or used. NL Turns retained: !SV!.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Drain [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL Deal !D! damage. NL Flash !M!: Steal up to !SV! units of a random enemy buff.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL Deal !D! damage. NL Power_Flash !M!: Steal up to !SV! units of a random enemy buff.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.NAME: [#746550]Crush
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Charges: !SV! NL Deal !D! damage, apply Stagger based on enemy Block. NL Armor_Piercing: !M!. NL Charged 1: Increase Armor_Piercing and Stagger by 50%.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGauntletCharger.NAME: [#746550]Gauntlet [#746550]Charger
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGauntletCharger.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Charges: !SV! NL Discharge the Leviathan to deal !D! damage randomly or recharge it to gain !B! Block per charge.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.NAME: [#746550]Ground [#746550]Splitter
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Charges: !SV!. NL Stagger all enemies depending on their total Block. Charged 1: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanDeepImpact.NAME: [#746550]Deep [#746550]Impact
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanDeepImpact.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Charges: !SV! NL Deal !D! damage to the first enemy. NL Unstoppable: Enemy Block. Gain Armor_Piercing: !M! NL Charged: 2. Always activate Unstoppable.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEarthquake.NAME: [#746550]Earthquake
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEarthquake.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Charges: !SV!. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies, ignores thorns. NL Charged 3: Attack a second time at half damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenous.NAME: [#80ca2d]Ravenous
theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenous.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 4: Gain 3 Vicious. NL Deal !D! damage, Gain !M! Vicious. NL Retain: Increase Vicious gain by 2 until Weapon_Swap or combat ends.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 4: Gain 3 Vicious. NL Deal !M! damage, gain !D! Vicious. NL Retain: Increase Vicious gain by 2 until Weapon_Swap or combat ends.
Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 4: Sated. NL Deal !M! damage, gain !D! Vicious. NL Retain: Increase Vicious gain by 2 until Weapon_Swap or combat ends.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantChopChopCHOP.NAME: [#80ca2d]Chop [#80ca2d]Chop [#80ca2d]CHOP
theWeaponMaster:RevenantChopChopCHOP.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 5: Gain another Attack. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 5: Gain another Attack. NL Deal !D! damage.
Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 5: Sated. NL Deal !D! damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantNoseToTail.NAME: [#80ca2d]Nose [#80ca2d]To [#80ca2d]Tail
theWeaponMaster:RevenantNoseToTail.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 6: Reduce Nose_to_Tail threshold by 1. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply Nose_to_Tail. NL Gain !M! Vicious.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 6: Reduce Nose_to_Tail threshold by 1. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply Nose_to_Tail
Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 6: Sated. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply Nose_to_Tail.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantHungrySteel.NAME: [#80ca2d]Hungry [#80ca2d]Steel
theWeaponMaster:RevenantHungrySteel.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 8: Apply and increase base Cattle_to_Slaughter by 1, deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vicious.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 8: Apply and increase base Cattle_to_Slaughter by 1, deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vicious.
Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 8: Sated. NL Apply Cattle_to_Slaughter, deal !D! damage.  NL Gain !M! Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.NAME: [#80ca2d]Bloodbath
theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 10: Gain Vicious equal to 5 times your energy. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and lose 5 Vicious. NL Unstoppable: 5+ Vicious.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 10: Gain !EN_MULT! Vicious. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and lose 5 Vicious. NL Unstoppable: 5+ Vicious.
Revenant_Cleaver NL Hungry 10: Sated. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and lose 5 Vicious. NL Unstoppable: 5+ Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSource.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Source
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSource.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage to your target and apply Mana_Burn. NL Ignite !M!

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Scissors
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage and Ignite !M! twice.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Ignite !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Right Half
Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Mana_Burn, then Deal !D! damage and Ignite 1.
Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Mana_Burn. !M!. NL Split_Scissors !B!, Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposScissorHalf.NAME: [#3abfbe]Left [#3abfbe]Half
theWeaponMaster:AtroposScissorHalf.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage, Ignite !M!. NL Split_Scissors !B!, Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPath.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Path
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPath.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Target Enemy attacks a random enemy this turn. Apply !M! Mana_Burn. Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Pain
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Delay half of the damage you take to next turn.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Delay one third of the damage you take to next turn. The remaining third is dealt to all enemies instead.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSoul.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Soul
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSoul.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Costs one less for every Mana Burn target enemy has. Deal !D! damage. NL Ignite All. Consume all Mana_Burn stacks.

theWeaponMaster:Strike_WeaponMaster.NAME: Standard Issue
theWeaponMaster:Strike_WeaponMaster.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage. NL (Counts as Basic Strike).

theWeaponMaster:RevolverBuckshot.NAME: Buckshot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverBuckshot.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.
theWeaponMaster:RevolverBuckshot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverCustomCartridge.NAME: Custom Cartridge
theWeaponMaster:RevolverCustomCartridge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust one single target Attack Ammo. NL Deal !M! % damage to the target and !SV! % damage to the creature behind it.
theWeaponMaster:RevolverCustomCartridge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust one single target Attack Ammo. NL Deal !M! % damage to the target and !SV! % damage to the creature behind it. NL Unstoppable: Enemy Minions ( !SV! % damage).

theWeaponMaster:RevolverDoubleTap.NAME: Double Tap
theWeaponMaster:RevolverDoubleTap.DESCRIPTION: The next Ammunition card this turn is played a second time for half damage.
theWeaponMaster:RevolverDoubleTap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next Ammunition card this turn is played a second time for two-thirds damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverFullMetal.NAME: Full Metal Jacket
theWeaponMaster:RevolverFullMetal.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Armor_Piercing: !M!.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverHollowPoint.NAME: Hollow-Point Ammo
theWeaponMaster:RevolverHollowPoint.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Rending !M!.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverLowRecoil.NAME: Low Recoil Ammo
theWeaponMaster:RevolverLowRecoil.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage. Play the top card if it's a Revolver card or add it to your hand otherwise.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverMarksmanship.NAME: Marksmanship
theWeaponMaster:RevolverMarksmanship.DESCRIPTION: Revolver cards now also scale with Dexterity. Gain !M! Dexterity.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverKneecap.NAME: Kneecap
theWeaponMaster:RevolverKneecap.DESCRIPTION: Kneecap target enemy for three turns and reduce their Strength by !M!.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverQuickload.NAME: Quickload
theWeaponMaster:RevolverQuickload.DESCRIPTION: Immediately Reload your revolver and get the first Ammunition card from your draw pile.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverSpecialGradeAmmo.NAME: Special Grade Ammo
theWeaponMaster:RevolverSpecialGradeAmmo.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage and apply either !M! Lacerate or Mana_Burn.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverTwinned.NAME: Twinned Shot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverTwinned.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverUnload.NAME: Unload
theWeaponMaster:RevolverUnload.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Discard Ammunition cards from your hand and deal !D! damage each. If you still have shots left in your Revolver, continue discarding cards from your draw pile instead.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverWarningShot.NAME: Warning Shot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverWarningShot.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Stagger all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:BullyBullysAudacity.NAME: The Bully's Audacity
theWeaponMaster:BullyBullysAudacity.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex! NL Gain !M! Block for every Bully card played this fight.

theWeaponMaster:BullyClothesline.NAME: Clothesline
theWeaponMaster:BullyClothesline.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Frail.

theWeaponMaster:BullyConfidence.NAME: Confidence
theWeaponMaster:BullyConfidence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Gain !M! Artifact, gain !B! Block.

theWeaponMaster:BullyDinerArgument.NAME: Diner Argument
theWeaponMaster:BullyDinerArgument.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Exhaust. Can only be played as the first card of a turn. NL Force every enemy to take a random action.

theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidatingPresenc.NAME: Intimidating Presence
theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidatingPresenc.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL All enemies lose !M! Strength. At the end of the next !M! turns, they regain 1 Strength.

theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.NAME: Intimidate
theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex! NL Intimidate target enemy.

theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.NAME: Mean to everyone!
theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Exhaust. Taunt all enemies. They gain !M! Strength and you gain !M! Strength for every applied Taunt. Lose half of the gained Strength at the end of the turn.

theWeaponMaster:BullyMockery.NAME: Mockery
theWeaponMaster:BullyMockery.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Target enemy gains !M! Weak if they're attacking or !M! Vulnerable otherwise.
theWeaponMaster:BullyMockery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL All enemies gain !M! Weak if the'yre attacking or !M! Vulnerable otherwise.

theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.NAME: Shakedown
theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage. Target enemy 'donates' a little random amount of gold (3-6 Gold).
theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage. Target enemy 'donates' a little random amount of gold (6-9 Gold).

theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.NAME: Slap
theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak.
theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage damage twice each and apply !M! Weak.

theWeaponMaster:BullySuckerPunch.NAME: Sucker Punch
theWeaponMaster:BullySuckerPunch.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage, deal double damage and Intimidate if this is the first card played this combat.
theWeaponMaster:BullySuckerPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Innate NL Deal !D! damage, deal double damage and Intimidate if this is the first card played this combat.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.NAME: Terrifying Howl
theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Intimidate all enemies. Gain !BULLY! additional Vicious per Intimidated enemy.
theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Exhaust. Apply !M! Vulnerable and Intimidate all enemies. Gain !BULLY! additional Vicious per Intimidated enemy.

theWeaponMaster:BullyPushover.NAME: Pushover
theWeaponMaster:BullyPushover.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. The enemy takes !M! Damage for every debuff.

theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.NAME: Wimp
theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:GenericBerserkerStance.NAME: Berserker Stance
theWeaponMaster:GenericBerserkerStance.DESCRIPTION: Vicious doesn't decay at the end of the turn anymore. Gain 1 extra Vicious every time you attack.
theWeaponMaster:GenericBerserkerStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Vicious doesn't decay at the end of the turn anymore. Gain 1 extra Vicious every time you attack.

theWeaponMaster:GenericBobAndWeave.NAME: Bob and Weave
theWeaponMaster:GenericBobAndWeave.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Bob: gain additional !M! Block for every attacking enemy. NL Weave: 1 energy if all enemies are attacking.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Bob
Gain !B! Block, gain additional !M! Block for every attacking enemy.
Weave
Gain !B! Block, gain 1 Energy if all enemies are attacking.

theWeaponMaster:GenericCounterBlow.NAME: Counter Blow
theWeaponMaster:GenericCounterBlow.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top card of your draw pile to immediately counter an enemy's attack for !M! plus the cards cost, or up to !D! damage if you discarded an Attack (and it's higher.).

theWeaponMaster:GenericDodge.NAME: Dodge
theWeaponMaster:GenericDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a random Attack card from your discard pile to your hand.
theWeaponMaster:GenericDodge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a random Attack and Skill card from your discard pile to your hand.

theWeaponMaster:GenericFlashbang.NAME: Flashbang
theWeaponMaster:GenericFlashbang.DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive !stslib:ex! NL Stun target enemy. Stagger both adjacent enemies.
theWeaponMaster:GenericFlashbang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive !stslib:ex! NL Stun target enemy. Stagger both adjacent enemies and draw a card.

theWeaponMaster:GenericGrazingThrow.NAME: Grazing Throw
theWeaponMaster:GenericGrazingThrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Nicked to target enemy.

theWeaponMaster:GenericGuillotineChoke.NAME: Guillotine Choke
theWeaponMaster:GenericGuillotineChoke.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SV! Weak and !M! Mana_Burn to target enemy. Gain !B! Block.

theWeaponMaster:GenericInvestigate.NAME: Investigate
theWeaponMaster:GenericInvestigate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive !stslib:ex! NL Gain !B! Block. If this card is exhausted through the Exhaustive effect, choose 1 from 3 Attack and Skill cards each, they cost 0 this turn.

theWeaponMaster:GenericOpportunism.NAME: Opportunism
theWeaponMaster:GenericOpportunism.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block if target enemy wants to attack, otherwise deal !D! damage.

theWeaponMaster:GenericPreparation.NAME: Preparation
theWeaponMaster:GenericPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, and !M! Dexterity. If your Block isn't broken, the next Attack card costs 1 less Energy.
theWeaponMaster:GenericPreparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, and !M! Dexterity. If your Block isn't broken, the next !M! Attack cards cost 1 less Energy.

theWeaponMaster:GenericRecklessness.NAME: Recklessness
theWeaponMaster:GenericRecklessness.DESCRIPTION: Draw an extra card for the next !M! turns, gain !M! Vulnerable.

theWeaponMaster:GenericRelaxAndRecollect.NAME: Relax and Recollect
theWeaponMaster:GenericRelaxAndRecollect.DESCRIPTION: Relax: Gain !B! Block, gain 1 Block for every 3 Vicious. NL Recollect: Exhaust !M! cards from your discard pile, gain !SV! Energy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Relax
Gain !B! Block and draw a card. Gain an additional 2 Block for every 3 Vicious.
Recollect
Draw a card. Exhaust !M! cards from your discard pile, gain !SV! Energy.

theWeaponMaster:GenericRedirectBlows.NAME: Redirect Blows
theWeaponMaster:GenericRedirectBlows.DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive !stslib:ex! NL Gain !B! Block. Until the next turn you take !SV! % less damage, then gain Block equal to the damage taken.

theWeaponMaster:GenericSleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
theWeaponMaster:GenericSleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a card then return one card to your hand.

theWeaponMaster:GenericThrowingKnives.NAME: Throwing Knives
theWeaponMaster:GenericThrowingKnives.DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive !stslib:ex! NL Deal !D! damage. NL If discarded, deal !D! damage !stslib:ex! times to a random enemy.
